title: Understanding Clouds - EDA and Keras U-Net
description: Understanding Clouds from Satellite Images Can you classify cloud structures from satellites?In this competition we need to analyze and process cloud images taken from satellites in order to identify cloud formations and help improve the earth's climate understanding.Dependencies
